А игра стала говном с ее переходом на фри ту плей, еще больше читеров и бестолковые обновления касающиеся убытков VALVE в финансовой отрасли стим! ДОДЕЛАЙТЕ ЕЕ ДЛЯ ИГРОКОВ! ОДУМАЙТЕСЬ!

It amazes me how different each match I play is. No matter what, you almost always meet new people and play with different styles and tactics. Very team-based (which more people used mics!) but still enjoyable.
Tight controls and a high skill ceiling. Fantastic!
Хорошая игра, даёт планы на будущие, когда начинаешь хорошо играть, мечтаешь как-буд-то ты киберспортсмен.
I enjoy playing this, it is very good
good game not for beginers not ur cod or anything takes skill only bad thing about it is now the cheaters can cheat cause the game is free hope they fix that soon

Played it for almost 5k hours. Am still bad. Good Game though
csgo ist ein tolles spiel, wenn man es schafft mal nicht in einer hacker lobby zukommen.
just doing this for the summer sale challenge

The game is good but since it became free to play, there has been an increase in the number of hackers in MM. Ignoring the hackers, the game is good. It's guns are its selling point. It's always fun to play with an AWP or an AK or the best weapon of all: a deagle.
Cheating in this game was always a problem, but ever since f2p it honestly weeded cheaters out of prime and high trust factor games. It just sucks for new players.
if you want your friends with 1000+hr to yell at you for failing to win the 1v5 after they died in the first 20seconds of the round, this is your game
Great FPS game love the fast pace
в этой игре можно узнать много нового о себе
